name: genemark-et
description:
Gene Prediction in Bacteria, archaea, Metagenomes and
Metatranscriptomes. When downloaded this file is named the same for all
versions. Spack will search your current directory for the download
file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find
it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-yaml
dependencies.description:
This module has been released to CPAN as YAML::Old, and soon YAML.pm
will be changed to just be a frontend interface module for all the
various Perl YAML implementation modules, including YAML::Old

dependencies.name: perl-hash-merge
dependencies.description: Hash::Merge merges two arbitrarily deep hashes into a single hash.

dependencies.name: perl-parallel-forkmanager
dependencies.description: A simple parallel processing fork manager

dependencies.name: perl-logger-simple
dependencies.description: Implementation of the Simran-Log-Log and Simran-Error-Error modules

dependencies.name: perl-mce
dependencies.description:
MCE - Many-Core Engine for Perl providing parallel processing
capabilities. MCE spawns a pool of workers and therefore does not fork a
new process per each element of data. Instead, MCE follows a bank
queuing model. Imagine the line being the data and bank-tellers the
parallel workers. MCE enhances that model by adding the ability to chunk
the next n elements from the input stream to the next available worker.

dependencies.name: perl-thread-queue
dependencies.description:
Thread::Queue - Thread-safe queues. This module provides thread-safe
FIFO queues that can be accessed safely by any number of threads.

dependent_to.name: braker
dependent_to.description:
BRAKER is a pipeline for unsupervised RNA-Seq-based genome annotation
that combines the advantages of GeneMark-ET and AUGUSTUS
